Introduction

Suri (수리) is a South Korean rapper and dancer under GRACE COMPANY Entertainment. She is a member of the pre-debut co-ed group CHECKMATE. She is also a former member of AMOR and the pre-debut disbanded girl group Rendezvous.

Aug 10, 2017

active
